meanings.definition: To chew or bite on something noisily
meanings.sent1: The puppy was chomping on his favorite toy.
meanings.sent2: She was chomping on a crunchy apple.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel was chomping on acorns like there was no tomorrow.
meanings.sent4: The waves chomped at the shore, eroding it slowly.
meanings.sent5: The old man's dentures chomped loudly as he ate his dinner.

meanings.definition: To eat something eagerly or greedily
meanings.sent1: The kids were chomping on the delicious pizza slices.
meanings.sent2: He was chomping on popcorn while watching the movie.
meanings.sent3: The raccoon was chomping on the stolen cookies with a mischievous grin.
meanings.sent4: Time chomps away at our youth, leaving us with memories.
meanings.sent5: The hungry bear chomped down the fish in one swift motion.
